title: activities
body: Support web activities standard, which is only currently supported by Firefox OS and was dropped in chrome. This will allow nice things in the web, like an improved ease in sharing things in social networks and creating media on the web by mashing up content from disparate websites. Furthermore, a standard should be pushed for. As long as there is a standard for this which works, I don't think anyone will care whether it's web activities or web intents (the two APIs which were proposed in the past for this)
